New Records: Zac Gallen struck out a season-high 11 batters in six dominant innings
Key Match Events: Christian Walker got the offense going with a double in the second inning
Pavin Smith put the game on ice with a pinch-hit, three-run homer in the eighth
Pre-Game Insights: The D-backs desperately needed a strong outing from their best starter Zac Gallen
Post-Match Reflections: Gallen finishes his 2024 regular season with a 14-6 record and a 3.65 ERA
The D-backs record goes to 88-71 and are in line to start game one of a Wild Card playoff series should they make it that far
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mike Yastrzemski made a fantastic running catch on a line shot into the corner by Corbin Carroll with the bases loaded
Others: The D-backs broke a three-game losing streak with an 8-2 victory over the Giants
